title: Construction of novel 1D nickel phosphonate nanorod modified 2D g-C3N4 nanosheets for enhanced photocatalytic hydrogen evolution performance
content:
Sustainable Energy Fuels, 2024, 8,964-974
DOI: 10.1039/D3SE01324C, Paper
Xin-Lian Song, Sixiang Zhai, Jin-Tao Ren, Lijiao Gao, Zhong-Yong Yuan
A novel 1D nickel phosphonate is designed to modify 2D g-C3N4 nanosheets for photocatalytic hydrogen production, which provides new insights into the design of composite constituents and extended application of metal phosphonates.
